class.rdfs:comment:
The act of providing an object under an agreement that it will be returned at a later date. Reciprocal of BorrowAction.

Related actions:

  • BorrowAction: Reciprocal of LendAction.
class.rdfs:label: LendAction

schema:borrower.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The person that borrows the object being lent.
schema:borrower.rdfs:label: borrower
